alert.note: Alert for Carter (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 15 at 8:36PM CST until February 15 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CST FOR CENTRAL CARTER AND SOUTHWESTERN MURRAY COUNTIES... At 835 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles south of Milo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lone Grove, Healdton, Wilson, Springer, Graham, Milo, Turner Falls and Lake Of The Arbuckles. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
